name: Mini Golf in Frozen City
description:
MiniGolf in Frozen City

years ago elite mini golf tournaments was held in this city, then came climate change... 

city froze all citizen left...

now many years later Frozen City is a destination for the ultimate mini golf challenge!

Use mouse/trackpad movement to aim the golf ball.

Click left mouse button for power scale and click

again to shoot the golf ball.

Unload power with right mouse button.

1-8 players

18 holes x2 courses

Adventure mixes holes

A Special training level

r            -  Reset hole

m          -  Toggle music

s            -  Creates save state and exits to main menu

Window 64-bit ,DX11
